existing_features.title: Remove the inner grey box styling from the species field in the case card display
Move the remaining task list section to appear below the notes field in the case card layout
Add functionality to edit remaining tasks for existing cases, allowing users to modify which tasks are selected
Add a purple box with matching shading around the histo task item in the remaining tasks checklist
Add a blue box with matching shading around the imaging task item in the remaining tasks checklist
Ensure colored boxes around histo and imaging tasks maintain proper alignment of all checkboxes in the remaining tasks list

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove inner grey box from species field
Move remaining task list to below notes field
Add option to edit remaining tasks
Add purple box with matching shading around histo section
Add blue box with matching shading around imaging section
Maintain checkbox alignment when adding colored boxes

projectName: Refine case card layout with colored task sections and edit capability
